output.sentences: People swimming in the Dead Sea need to be mindful of several rules.
A large group of people gathered at the water's edge.
Floating was effortless in the Dead Sea.
It was much harder, however, to learn how to ride a camel.
The mountains rising above the sea was a beautiful view to end the day.
